description:
Multibrowse is a CLI launcher for Google Chrome that makes it trivial to open full-screen windows onto multiple monitors.

## Package Parameters
* `/installLocation` - Install to a different destination folder. Default: `$Env:ChocolateyToolsLocation\multibrowse`
Example: `choco install multibrowse --params '"/installLocation:C:\opt\multibrowse"'`
author: Ivo Janssen
